components.name: CLI Interface
components.description: Command-line interface for user interaction and deployment command execution.

components.name: Task Scheduler
components.description: Manages deployment tasks, job queues, and execution orchestration.

components.name: Configuration Store
components.description: Stores deployment configurations, secrets, and environment settings.

components.name: Message Queue
components.description: Facilitates asynchronous communication between components for task distribution.

data_flows.description: User commands and deployment parameters are sent to the task scheduler for processing.
Scheduled tasks are pushed to the message queue for asynchronous execution.
Deployment credentials and settings are retrieved from the configuration store for task execution.
Logs and metadata are stored in the configuration store for audit and debugging.

trust_boundaries.name: External CLI Boundary
trust_boundaries.description: CLI interface is exposed to external users, requiring strict input validation and authentication.

trust_boundaries.name: Internal Service Boundary
trust_boundaries.description: Task Scheduler and Message Queue operate within a trusted internal network with restricted access.
